name: Thermostat
description: * Thermostat starts at 20 degrees ✓ * You can increase the temperature with an up function ✓ * You can decrease the temperature with a down function ✓ * The minimum temperature is 10 degrees ✓ * If power saving mode is on, the maximum temperature is 25 degrees ✓ * If power saving mode is off, the maximum temperature is 32 degrees ✓ * Power saving mode is on by default but it can also be turned off ✓ * You can reset the temperature to 20 with a reset function ✓ * You can ask about the thermostat's current energy usage: < 18 is low-usage, <= 25 is medium-usage, anything else is high-usage. ✓ * (In the challenges where we add an interface, low-usage will be indicated * with green, medium-usage indicated with black, high-usage indicated with red.)
